title: Feedback Practice Integration Strategies for Web-Based Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental science theories and practical field experience
context.additional_context: Balancing real-time interaction and self-directed learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can perform science experiment simulations incorporating feedback on web-based platforms with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can navigate 90% of educational content by designing self-directed learning pathways in a nonlinear navigation structure.
Learners can revise and share personalized learning plans based on formative assessment results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
